name: Arrow-Hell
description:
You are the Black knight who is out to destroy the kingdom. Yet the common peoples raise up to defend themselves. Prepare to slaughter your way through the horde of unworthy peasants. As you ride them down since they are too cowardly to fight you face to face. Be careful there is strength in numbers and their arrows cold block out the sun.

Controls:

Movement : AWSD 

Toggle Offence/ Defense: Left Mouse 

The knight will follow the mouse 

This game was made for the Second Game Maker's Tool Kit Game Jam. We took the bullet-hell genre and removed the ability to shoot back.
